document_name: Executive Order No.785: Mandating the Presidential Task Force on Climate Change to Develop the National Climate Change Framework
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/PHL/2009/PHL-2009-01-01-Executive Order No.785: Mandating the Presidential Task Force on Climate Change to Develop the National Climate Change Framework_a5a1c4feaeb10caed763d05acb5d1b60.pdf
document_description: E.O. 774/2008 reorganises the task force.E.O. no 785/2009 1) mandates the Presidential Task Force On Climate Change to develop the national Climate change Framework; 2) directs the Task Group on Information to develop and coordinate a national information, education and communications program; 3) directs the presidential adviser on climate change to review government climate change programs and offical development assistance projets.
